header.h1: Download Dalam Kontak and stay connected!
header.p: Everything you need for communication and business in one place.

userFriendly.p: Light and intuitive design. Choose between day and night themes!

quickResponse.p: Notifications for new messages arrive instantly on your phone â€” you'll always be connected.

newsAndEvents.p: Stay updated with the latest news and events from friends and loved ones!

communities.p: Find and join interesting communities based on your hobbies and interests. Share experiences, exchange ideas, and find like-minded people. You can easily create your own communities.

media.p: Share photos and videos with friends. Upload your photos and videos to the Gallery!

messaging.p: A simple and reliable way to exchange messages for free and stay connected anywhere in the world!

expressEmotions.p: Sometimes words are not enough. Use stickers, share everyday impressions with the 'Status' feature.

growYourBusiness.p: With the Free Market, you can reach customers worldwide and scale your processes. Showcase products and services, increase sales, and build relationships with customers!

synchronization.p: Access from multiple devices simultaneously. Now you can easily switch between your smartphone, tablet, and computer. All your messages, notifications, and settings are synchronized in real-time, stay connected anytime and anywhere.
